attributes.action: Stop Care Homes charging privately funded more for care than publicly funded
attributes.background: The BBC Panorama programme 'Crisis in care part 2 Who Pays' recently highlighted the scandal of privately funded care home patients being charged significantly more for the same care as publicly funded patients. This amounts to systemic financial abuse of vulnerable people and must be stopped

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to put a cap on care home costs if that is something you would like to see happen.
